feed.title: GitHub Nextflow Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Nextflow in GitHub

entry.title: nf-core/genomeannotator
entry.summary: Pipeline for the identification of (coding) gene structures in draft genomes.

entry.title: nf-core/hicar
entry.summary: Pipeline for HiCAR data, a robust and sensitive multi-omic co-assay for simultaneous measurement of transcriptome, chromatin accessibility and cis-regulatory chromatin contacts.

entry.title: nf-core/clipseq
entry.summary: CLIP sequencing analysis pipeline for QC, pre-mapping, genome mapping, UMI deduplication, and multiple peak-calling options.
